extendedInfo.description: Search for books, DVDs, audiobooks, CDs and more. Place holds, check due dates and renew items. Find out whatâs happening at the library, or contact us. Weâre here for you!We've also included a great new way to search our catalog. Start typing the first letters of the title or author youâre looking for. So for books on "Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis," just type "ja ke on" and youâll get results right away. We hope you enjoy using this app as much as we do!

reviews.title: Keeps On Bouncing Me Back.When Loging In
reviews.comment: I\'ve then going to my local library where I don\'t live too far from my library. I decided do download the library\'s app. when I tried to login to my account numerous times, it kept on bouncing me back without logging me in. However, the only way to login was to go in a different area of the app. yet I was still having trouble ordering books, DVD\'s  etc. Don\'t give me wrong, its a good library app, but in my opinion, it needs a little bit of work. I rate the library app 3 out of 5 for difficulty.
reviews.author: Adam Scopino Jr.

reviews.title: What a dissapoiment!
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t work, it keeps sending me back to the login screen.
reviews.author: Audris Valoy

reviews.title: Terrible update.
reviews.comment: Worked great until recent update. Please fix.
